# Workshop Material

You can find all the material for the workshop on this website.
On top, you can navigate to the presentation slides, the tasks for each day and the code for all examples from the presentations and the solutions for the tasks.

The task solutions will be uploaded after the respective workshop day is finished. 

If you want to download the slides in pdf format, you can do that [here](www.github.com).
